definition: see 冒大不韙|冒大不韪[mao4 da4 bu4 wei3]
pinyin: mao4 tian1 xia4 zhi1 da4 bu4 wei3

definition: to emit/to give off/to send out (or up, forth)/to brave/to face/reckless/to falsely adopt (sb's identity etc)/to feign/(literary) to cover
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
obstinately clinging to one's course (idiom)/willful/one's own way/dogmatic
disgraceful (of behavior that is unfilial, rebellious or otherwise in grave breach of the norms of society)
to court disaster (idiom)/to dig one's own grave
to go against the tide (idiom); to do things all wrong/to try to turn back history/a perverse way of doing things
to offend sb/to give offense/to displease
breaking faith and abandoning right (idiom); to betray/treachery/perfidy
to dare (negative connotation)/to have the audacity to (do sth)
lit. to go to war without just cause (idiom)/to act without justification
to place righteousness before family (idiom); ready to punish one's own family if justice demands it
